titles.title: A bill to require the General Accounting Office to conduct a study of the benefits and costs of modifying coverage under the medicare program to include different levels of extended care.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Spending, Budget, Account.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Directs the Comptroller General to conduct a study and issue a report to the Congress regarding the benefits and costs of modifying coverage of extended care services under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include different levels of such services.
